tool_description: Groove is a simple tool for growing small businesses - help your team deliver personal customer support.  Ticket management, tracking and reports, and email integration.
name: Groove
title: Groove

api_list.name: List all customers

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of messages to return per page (max 50)

api_list.name: Find one message
List all messages

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of messages to return per page (max 50)

api_list.name: Find one ticket
Find one agent
Find one customer
Find one ticket's state
List tickets

optional_parameters.name: assignee
optional_parameters.description: The email address of the assignee or "unassigned" to find all unassigned tickets

optional_parameters.name: customer
optional_parameters.description: Returns tickets belonging to the specified customer

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of messages to return per page (max 50)

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Returns tickets with the specified state only
